Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 5 from any)
Bardic Lore: Allows using Bardic Lore to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Esoteric Polymath: Allows learning 1 additional spell from spellbook each day, treating it as a signature spell if it is in repertoire
Oddity Identification: Gives +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a mental, possession, predication, or scrying trait
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: Allows using Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation

Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 5; O1: 3 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' radius may substitute caster Performance roll for save
Inspire Courage (O0 Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
True Strike (O1 Div): (1) Caster's next Strike in same turn uses the better of two rolls, ignores concealed or hidden, and ignores circumstance penalties
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and +1 Focus Point
Enigma: Knows the True Strike occult spell
Occult Spellcasting: Allows learning spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Bizarre Magic: Others suffer +5 DC to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic on self spells
Esoteric Polymath: Allows using Occultism to add spells to spellbook
Notes
Validation Errors:
Bizarre Magic Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and occultism rank (currently 1) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
